snippet: Braden Holtby made the only mistake in a game of stellar saves, getting caught behind the net and practically gifting Mike Cammalleri a third-period goal in the visiting Devils’ 1-0 win over the Washington Capitals on Friday night.
abstract: New Jersey Devils beat Washington Capitals, 1-0; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Braden Holtby made the only mistake in a game of stellar saves, getting caught behind the net and practically gifting Mike Cammalleri a third-period goal in the visiting Devils’ 1-0 win over the Washington Capitals on Friday night.
